title: The Heart of It
description: On the outside rich and successful Gabe Peterson has everything. No one would guess the ghosts from his past are tearing him apart. Desperate, he reaches out to Elena – a resilient call girl, with her own childhood scars – for help. In their moments of honesty, the two forge the most surprising relationship of their lives. But will they be brave enough to make it into something more?
author: Molly O'Keefe
